name: Hidden Secrets
description: A massive bookcase with ample shelf space.\nThere's a saying among intelligence agents: "The secret is always concealed within the scatter of everyday objects." Here, one might hide a slip of paper between the pages of a book or tuck a weighty secret away at the back of the bookcase, ensuring this hefty piece of furniture remains a classic choice for anyone valuing privacy. Of course, skilled professionals can turn this knowledge to their advantage, using the bookcase itself to plant clever traps for their opponents instead...
